page.title: 14HOUSING - THREE MOSSES
page.content: The housing in the Three Mosses area can be defined as farms, bungalows, houses and flats. The properties along the moss roads are mainly farms, converted farmbuildings, houses and individually deisgned bungalows.In Haskayne village the houses and bungalows were designed many years ago as a housing development, and are therefore of a very similar design.The four flats over the shops in Haskayne are used by the shopkeeper as accommodation or as extra storage for the shop. Most of the homes in this area are privately owned. There are no slum areas or any clearances here. The two ancient houses are completely different to anything else in this area and are also privately owned.
